column1: an approach is provided for determining context information associated with one or more mobile devices and transferring content and services between the devices based on the contextual information. a transfer platform determines context information associated with at least one device, at least one other device, or a combination thereof. the transfer platform then causes, at least in part, at least one transfer of one or more functionalities of the at least one device, content associated with the at least one device, or a combination thereof from the at least one device to the at least one other device based, at least in part, on the context information.
